comments.high_risk_countries: Countries considered high-risk for security purposes
comments.high_risk_asn: ASNs associated with known malicious infrastructure (add as needed)
comments.country_risk_multiplier: Multiply risk score by this when connecting to high-risk country
comments.high_risk_asn_multiplier: Multiply risk score by this when connecting to high-risk ASN
comments.new_country_multiplier: Multiply risk when entity connects to a new country for first time
comments.rare_asn_multiplier: Multiply risk when connecting to a rarely-used ASN
